title: Luxury Townhouse + Amazing Bay Views + 60' Boat Dock + Private Pool
posting_body: ['Direct Bayfront Residence with Private Pool and 60-Foot Dock!', 'Located on the coveted tip of Gated Eastern Shores and is perfect for boaters or those who love to entertain.', 'Enjoy scenic views from this 4-Level Residence that features 3 Bedrooms + Office/Den / 3.5 Bathrooms, Expansive living spaces, high ceilings, and an elevator.', 'Two Car Garage + two additional driveway spaces.', 'Expansive Primary with Walk-in closet, and Spacious Bedrooms each have en-suite bathrooms.', 'Open Concept Kitchen/Dining and Living Room provide spectacular water views.', 'Private Office/Den located on ground level.', 'No fixed bridges & minutes by boat to Haulover Inlet and Ocean Access.', 'Excellent location close to Bal Harbour Shops, Aventura Mall, Sunny Isles, Aventura, and Hollywood Beach.', 'Pool Maintenance is included.', '***Please Text', 'A11240252', 'to', 'show contact info', 'For More Details & Pics Of This Listing***', 'CR#335', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'Daniel Lalama', 'Realtor', '🌐Global Luxury Realty, LLC', 'For more information or to schedule a showing, please, specify the', 'CR#', 'or address in your e-mail, text or call.', 'Listing information courtesy of A11240252, Nelson Duque, Fortune International Realty', 'If you’re tired of calling multiple ads only to find out that they have rented and you’re ready to work with a professional Realtor, give me a call.', 'I’ll have a few questions for you and you can ask me questions as well, so that I can help you find a great deal quickly!', '**INFORMATION IS BELIEVED ACCURATE BUT IS NOT WARRANTED.', 'YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR DOING YOUR OWN DUE DILIGENCE AND VERIFYING ALL INFORMATION INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO MEASURING THE SQUARE FOOTAGE OF THE PROPERTY, APPROVAL REQUIREMENTS, DEPOSITS, FEES, ROOM AND BATHROOM COUNT, ADDRESS, RENTAL RATE, ETC.', 'DANIEL LALAMA, GLOBAL LUXURY REALTY, LLC, AND ITS AGENTS CANNOT GUARANTEE YOUR APPROVAL WITH ASSOCIATIONS, LANDLORDS OR YOUR MOVE-IN DATES.', 'PRICE, AVAILABILITY, TERMS, AND ANY OTHER PERTINENT INFORMATION LISTED HERE IN THE ADVERTISEMENT ABOVE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE TO YOU OR ANYONE.', '**', '**IT IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY TO CHECK AND COMPLY WITH LANDLORD AND/OR ASSOCIATION PET RESTRICTION AND RULES.', 'DANIEL LALAMA, GLOBAL LUXURY REALTY, LLC, AND ITS AGENTS CANNOT GUARANTEE YOUR PET’S APPROVAL WITH ASSOCIATIONS, LANDLORDS, BUILDING MANAGEMENT, OR ANY OTHER GOVERNING BODY.', '**', '**PROPERTIES ARE POSTED ON AVERAGE FOR A 45 to 60 DAY PERIOD OF TIME.', 'DUE TO CURRENT HIGH RENTAL DEMAND, SOME PROPERTIES ADVERTISED MAY BE WITHDRAWN, CANCELLED, RENTED, PENDING OR SOLD WITHIN THE PAST', '45 DAYS OR MORE.', 'ALL PRICES AND AVAILABILITY ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE**', '**Buy, Sell or Lease…I’m happy to help you with all your real estate needs.', 'If you are interested in any other rentals, please let me know, I can help you find the perfect the perfect place**', '**Landlords looking for a real estate agent to lease or manage their properties…please feel free to contact me anytime.', '**Frequently Asked Questions**', 'What you will need to make an offer to lease a condo?', '    Signed contract to lease, copy of your ID, proof of income, application (if required at this stage), credit score (optional unless required) and letters of recommendation (optional).', 'Sometimes, local police report and other documents may be required.', 'Deposit?', '    ', 'A deposit is required once the contract to lease is accepted.', 'Lease agreement?', '   The lease agreement is generally offered after the Landlord has conducted their due diligence, the contract to lease has been fully executed and the deposit has been funded.', 'At this time, the rest of the move in funds may be required to be funded or due before or on the move in date.', 'Always ask for clarification on this point.', 'Application?', '    Fees usually run $50 to $150 per applicant.', 'Generally, the application requires consent to a credit & background check.', 'Associations will generally require a copy of your ID and signed lease agreement to be submitted along with their fee (sometimes other fees and deposits may be required to be funded as well before they will start evaluating your application).', 'Always read, fill out completely and follow the application directions to avoid delays.', 'Ask for a copy of the rules and regulations of the building.', 'Move in cost?', '    1st, last, deposit, application fee, and any other required deposits or fees required by the landlord or association.', 'Approval time?', '    Generally, association approval (if required) takes 7 to 14 days from the day all paperwork, fees and deposits have been submitted/paid.', 'Although less common, some associations/management companies offer rapid approval while others may take up to 3 to 4 weeks or more to approve.', 'The lease agreement is subject to association approval.', 'Neighborhoods and Cities:     Fort Lauderdale, Pompano Beach, Hollywood, Oakland Park, Las Olas, Victoria Park, Wilton Manors, Plantation, Davie, Coral Ridge, Seven Isles, Las Olas, Lake Ridge, Miami Beach, Brickell, Wynwood, Midtown, Design District, El Portal, SoFi, South of Fifth, SoBe, South Beach, Mid Beach, North Beach, North Miami Beach, Edgewater, Normandy Isle, Coral Gables', 'Buildings:     Mirador, Flamingo, Roney Palace, Decoplage, South Bay Club, Icon, Apogee, Waverly, The Ivy, Fortune House, Wind Condo, The Floridian, Bentley Bay, Yacht Club, Murano, Wind, Mint, Ivy, Axis on Brickell, Echo Brickell, Neo Vertika, Park Grove, Carbonell Brickell']
